summary: "The Prestige" is a 2006 mystery movie about two rival magicians, Robert Angier (Hugh Jackman) and Alfred Borden (Christian Bale), in old London. They compete to create the best magic trick, using teleportation. The film is directed by Christopher Nolan and stars famous actors like Michael Caine and Christian Bale. It got good reviews and made a lot of money. It was also nominated for two Academy Awards for its great visuals.
title: The Prestige (film)
